org.nlpcraft.model.builder

Class NCModelBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nlpcraft.model.builder.NCModelBuilder

  • public class NCModelBuilder
extends Object
    Model builder for NCModel instances.

    To use this builder start by either invoking:
    • newModel()
    or by loading static model definition in JSON or YAML:
    • newJsonModel(InputStream)
    • newJsonModel(String)
    • newYamlModel(InputStream)
    • newYamlModel(String)
    • newJsonStringModel(String)
    • newYamlStringModel(String)
    Once you have the builder instance you can set all necessary properties and finally call build() method to get properly constructed NCModel instance. Note that at the minimum the descriptor and the query function must be set.

      • newModel

        public static NCModelBuilder newModel(String mdlId,
                                      String mdlName,
                                      String mdlVer)
        Creates new model builder with given parameters.
        Parameters:
        mdlId - Unique, immutable ID of the model.
        mdlName - Descriptive name of this model.
        mdlVer - Version of this model using semantic versioning compatible with (www.semver.org) specification.
        Returns:
        New model builder.

        Returns:

      • setSolver

        public NCModelBuilder setSolver(NCIntentSolver solver)
        Sets intent solver to be used for this model's NCModel.query(NCQueryContext) method implementation. Note that this method ensures that model builder will check and validate the intents against this model when build() method is called.

        Note also that you can use setQueryFunction(Function) method to set intent solver for this model. However, since model builder wouldn't have access to the actual intent solver it won't be able to check and validate the intents. It is highly recommended to use this method when using NCIntentSolver.
        Parameters:
        solver - Intent solver to set.

      • build

        public NCModel build()
              throws NCBuilderException
        Returns newly built model. Note that at the minimum the descriptor and the query function must be set.
        Returns:
        New built model.
        Throws:
        NCBuilderException - Thrown in case of any errors building the model.

      • loadFromDump

        public NCModel loadFromDump(String dumpFilePath)
                     throws NCBuilderException
        Loads and creates data model proxy from given model dump.
        Parameters:
        dumpFilePath - Dump file path.
        Returns:
        Newly built model proxy. Proxy will have a no-op callback implementations for intent and will return the following JSON response: 
         {
     "modelId": "model-id",
     "intentId": "intent-id",
     "modelFile": "model-id-01:01:01:123.gz"
  }
        Throws:
        NCBuilderException - Thrown in case of any errors building the model.
        See Also:
        NCDumpReader, NCDumpWriter
